name: Spot It! – spot the color shade & different letter
name_original: Spot It! – spot the color shade & different letter
description:
How well do you see color? In fact, 1 out of 12 men and 1 out of 255 women have some form of color vision deficiency. Spot It! - Take the challenge to see whether you have a color deficiency or have the potential for super color vision!

Besides color challenges, we still prepare Alphabet puzzles to test your eyesight. Easy to play! Just simply tap to spot the color shade or different letter.

*COLOR: Easy: Spot color shade
Medium: Spot color shade + different letter
Hard: Spot color shade + same letter
*ALPHABET: Spot different letter.

Take up this crazy eyesight gauntlet!
